column4: hey.. anyone have any problems with any updates... my install will not use the nvidia drivers now.
how did you install the nvidia drivers? envy, automatix, directly from nvidia.com?
what guy exactly? ubuntu restricted drivers?
pastebin your xorg.log and output of dpkg -l |grep nvidia
then you haven't used the ubuntu drivers
what package is the ubuntu restricted?
but it should from what you told me. I think your sda is not your first BIOS drive
that's why. uninstall all mesa stuff
then reinstall the glx package from nvidia restricted and make usre all /usr/lib/libGL* come from a nvidia package only
